TopicTitle: how do I get an avatar? (and hello)

Articles.Content:
Greetings from Planet 10. I'm a new guy and here's a new guy question: How do I get an avatar to show up in these forums? When I log in and check my settings, I'm allowed to click on the 'edit my avatar' button, but the only option there is 'Do Not Use an Avatar.'

What am I missing?

Thanks, and Peace.

cs
You need 5 posts before you are a fully fledged member. This is to ensure Bots don't invade the forums. Make a few more posts and you are good to go.
